values: 8 more hours before i leave to KLIA. I havent pack anything yet...even the simplest thing. nyehehe..im just plain lazy. I was very much excited to go back at first but i just hate packing, and the 6 hours of torture(45 mins of journey to the airport,2 hours of lingering around the airport and another 2.5 in the plane and +++). it just sucks. Why am i complaining? i am goin home you see. But i just can't avoid this feeling everytime i fly home :s Anyway, yesterday i went out for more than 12 hours and it was fun fun fun. Woke up early morning for dim sum then went straight to Kota Kemuning Clubhouse for tennis and then sauna and steam bath. Didn't really enjoy though cuz we were rushing for the 1o'clock movie : War Of The Worlds. Its definitely worth watching minus the 'a lil' unperfect ending. Had a great time hanging out with my pals but things would be a little different as Sharon is leaving to Aussie on tuesday. Gonna miss her lotssss.. Alrighty..i think im gonna go get dressed. Im heading to Pyramid soon..to get some stuff for ahem* ( you guys owe me a big one) Anyways, i hope you guys will like the wallet and bags i bought u guys =). See you guys soon..muahsss

3 more assignments and it's the final. Im counting the days for holidays. Did i mention that i jus getmy hair permed last wed? hehehe...it feels good for a change but now my hair is sorta turning straight again. I think i wanna go for a re-perm. Im luvin wavy hair for now.
I wanna go home. Back to where i belong.

Happy New Year everyone! May it be a good start =) So New Year eve went well.. dinner,movie then countdown. Im totally not excited at all this time. To be exact, i wasnt even happy at all. No idea why. Probably i feel all lonely. There are times when i really wanted a special someone to be by my side. It's just that i havent been able to find the one yet. And yea, im real picky :P But i really wanted something that can last rather than just a fling and of cause..chemistry must be there. 

And darn, did i mention dat im still working? yea, cuz im broke and i needed money so this sunday will be my last. I feel so tired right now and i still gotta wake up early tomoro to get to work. UGGHH..
Im just in this mood where my life seems so colourless. nothing to be excited about. blahhh...

i need more sleep.

New year resolution? looking forward for something better than 2004. It jus didnt work out well.

first and foremost, i wanna give a big hug to 2 of my bestest gurlfrens, chu and cynthea for sending me the Christmas card and the gift. Love you guys so much =) Its such a wonderful surprise and the card is sooo...beautiful. cant wait till we reunite in kk again. we'll have so much fun till no one can tolerant wif our craziness..mwahahaha. for the first time this morning i woke up without having to rush to anywhere. yesterday was supposed to be my last day at work but since theres not enuff people working, im working on xmas day. Which will be my official last day in MFM. I started off hating the job so much and i wanted to quit ever since the first few days of working. But Leonard says the most encouraging words that made me stay. And i did, its amazing dat i lasted 6 weeks there. It sux shit at first but as time passes by, i started to get the hang of it. Nothing starts out perfectly. Its the way you handle stuff that leads to perfection. 9 more days and 2004 will be in the past. I wanna do something memorable..do i make any sense? hahaha.. at least, something dat i'll remember so that 2004 will be more than a history of its own. It only makes me stronger When you say I can't do it I'll work that bit harder When you say it's not within my grip The barriers, I'll break them down I'll prove myself, I'll stick around I'll get through it all somehow Nothing's unreachable taken from the song by Will Young - Stronger
so sharul wanted to see how my msn looked like wif d 'special' features dat he don't have. mwahhaha..here goes.

christmas is here!! Christmas is here!! Haha..im jus so excited. Xmas is the best season on earth. Its not the pressies dat makes the whole thing good but the warmth feeling itself. Now all i want for xmas is a Ixus digi cam wit 4.0 megapixels k. So now all of you knows wat i want better start saving now k. muahs. Im gonna be alone for xmas cuz my 2 closest girlfrens aint here. Silvia and hannah has gone back to their hometown. I wanna go back too~! I jus can't wait. January 2005..here i come and im gonna storm kk like neva before. I think im goin nuts writing nonsense here so i better stop. oh btw, guess wat, i highlighted my hair again. yay. I think this will be the last time i ever dye my hair i don wanna torture my hair. well, at least for a period of time :] And oso, im gonna quit my job soon. Awesomeness. You have no idea how much i dislike it. Blerr. Anyway, thanksgiving dinner has been umm fun. Lotsa cool video clips.But too bad, i dont have my own camera so didn't get to take lotsa piccies. but still, will post up piccies soon but friends only. Neway, been wanting to post this for so long but was always too lazy haha.
from my window.. d ultra messy living room from d balcony..its really beautiful at nite. place for food.yay.

S.O.A.P - Deep in my heart( highly recommended) : a very good song :) Im so sick of working. Seriously, i havent taken a single break ever since exam. Even during the weekends after church i hafta go back to work again. :S Sigh..there are moments dat i feel like quitin but right now, i really needed extra cash. Its a bit sad when i see most of my frens going back to their respectively hometown and now here i am, still stuck here wit a job dat i dun really like. I guess it's jus hard to fit in being 'the new girl'. Somehow i feel oh-so awkward and being so stupid for making mistakes that i've been told not to do after so many times. Sigh..
I bring in the basket everytime i take a shower and my frens thinks im crazy for using oh-too many products or am i? hehehe.. Lets start wit.. F.A.C.E Neutrogena Extra Gentle Cleanser:. since my face is pretty sensitive so i gotta use something gentle ;) Neutrogena Deep Clean foaming cleanser:. oni uses this when my face is really oily cuz it's quite drying but it smells really good =) Clinelle:. one of my fave cuz its so creamy.. B.O.D.Y Ginvera green tea, my very essential body scrub hehe.. Lux [De-stress spa] Jus can't live without this. It smells so so good wit rich honey milk and lavender blend. It really calms me down. Stuf : Berrylicious with limetree blossom extract + sea salt - my new baby =) Johnson's baby milk bath : reminds me of how baby smells..so gentle and soft Carefree : erm..another essential item in a ladies' life i guess. H.A.I.R shampoooo Pantene Hair Fall control - doesnt really work as the product claims..but it smells okayy Loreal, for coloured hair : One of my fav shampoo till now. It sorta brightens and maintain the colour of the hair dye. Sunsilk :Got this for free. No questions ask. But it works fine newways. conditioners Wella Balsam : not too bad. Sanden Brooks : it makes my hair real soft Got this in Thailand during the vacation cuz i really need a conditioner and this is the cheapes i can find ( ran out of cash- shopping can nvr be a no_ ) Hair treatment Beauty Formulas wit avocado oil : works fine i guess Sanden Brooks intensive treatment : This works miracle..it sorta makes ur hair looks really straight and good. oh gosh, i gotta go back to work tomoro. Bloody 8 freakin hours! *faints*

Hallelujah! Exam is over~~~~~~~~~~ walalalallala....hahaha. Im jus so excited. There's just so many things that i haven't been doin for a while. It's been quite some time since i last hang out with my pals. I miss that. Haven't been going shopping for a while too. But i don't think i'll be able to do that often because i'm gonna start working tomorrow. *sigh* Im glad dat the exam's over but somehow there's no joy. ain't know why. Maybe i just need a break from everything and it's hard for me to do that. I really miss home. Everything will be so packed. Work,cell, church..i dun have time for other stuff nemore. Jus hope that everything will turns out alrite. But thank God i'll only have to work 5 hours for the first 3 days. newys..i went nuts jus now n took stewpit pictures..hoho~ Oh, btw..soon, i'm gonna make this journal viewable to frens oni. So if you wanna be added. Leave me a comment alrighty ;)
I wan this ultra thin sexy phone. Anyone has any idea how much is the market price? I havent been going out lately so i cant check out the price.

im living in procrastination i wish i could stop. Finals are 2 weeks away and i think theres a few things i should do..

1. Stay away from the internet. Internet is addictive...i would spend hours online surfing nothing-
2. Arrange my clothes in ma closet! its oh so messy i cant stand it but im too lazy
3. Sleep less. Can't help it..well, you can never say no to a short nap which always eventually leads      
   to long hours of sleep.
4. Shop less and eat less. Im broke and overspent this month. Die die die..
5. Plan a good time management..my life is upside down now.
6. Study study study!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Okay..so basically above all, the most important thing i should do is to study and sleep less. Internet and sleep is allll dat i should stay away from. So guess there wouldnt be any updates for about erm.. 3 weeks. Gambateh for everyones finals! 

i hate my life..i think it sucks..i want a revival in me..a revolution or something. im pathetic arent i?
My hsemate is killing me with his alarm clock. I think it will go on for another hour. Help pliz...

confusions strikes over me. was it jus friends or something more than that. when will all this mystery and misery gonna end. have you ever like someone but you're too afraid to take the risk ? cause in the future you know that u might hurt him in the end? Maybe somethings are never meant to be..if it's not yours, let it go.. Some beautiful things in the whole should be kept in our heart and not to hold it..
i receive a box of my favourite Ferrero Rocher chocolate yesterday in the mailbox. Love you guys to bits...tq tq for the pressie =) The feeling when you just finish your assignment is good.

My bad for not studying hard enough. And this time, im gonna work my ass off for MIP! so, guess i won't be able to update for a while..aint sure for how long. I think im having some kinda issue with myself. its just one of those unexplainable things that even me myself couldn't understand. I need time to cool off and here i go..searching for myself again. I wanna get to know who i really am. I wanna be me and nobody else. New Police Story Is a must watch. Not some lame-ass movie. Worth your time and money so go watch it. Btw, Im going to watch Resident Evil 2 tonite so, mwahahahaha. some random stuff i got for my bday. wanted to post this up years ago but was too lazy till today. so boo.. see ya peeps. latata...

I want something new. Something that can amaze me. I think im tired of my life. And i wan a special someone to be by my side. But where are you? why is it so hard to find you here with me..right here, right now..at this moment of my life.

it feels good to actually wake up early mornin and take a nice hot shower ain't it? hehehe... My week has been crazy...been sleepin at 3am and wakes up at 8am++ everyday to finish my assignment. I guess every uni students will go through all that. But it was fun...nevertheless, it was tiring but it actually feels good dat you've sacrificed something for a good cause(walallalala..) And now, i deserve a nice treat for maself =D I so wanna watch the movie 'the ghost' but no one wants to watch it with me! Cuz either they're too afraid or have watched it aredi. Why everyone so afraid ah? they say the movie is damn good.. huhuhuhu.. I love frou frou..the music is fantastic Promised piccies...here's picciess.... Yuke's bday at Zen.
Calvin n Yuke..lurvely coupla.. Btw, brownies is good. I luv em to bits.

Yesterday was my birthday. It was the best! And i guess i should be overjoyed and happy. But you know what, i didn't. Somehow, there's just an emptiness in my heart. Something that i can't explain why. This is this moment, you'll realize who is the one who cares for you and who isn't. Sometimes, its the person whom you thought care the most is the one who don't even give a shit at all. They're only there to put up some foolish act. I hate it when someone forgotten about my birthday and tries to cover it up by lying. Hey, that is not the way it works. But, thank you for the beautiful lies you made. Now i get to see what's deep inside you..

No, I'm not all sad because of that. It's not even worth it. I was even more grateful to see the pretty people around me. Thank you guys...love you peepo so so much~ hee..Esp. my mom, who made my day after the phone call.
I receive lotsa lotsa birthday gifts..and im lovin em to bits.Probably i'll post up d pics like...soon? 
taaaaaaa......blog soon. Goin for lecture now =)
[EDIT]a big shoutout to cynthea,chu and yong. Thanks so much for calling. Lub u guys![/EDIT]

Nikki is now out of Malaysia Idol. Im proud of her because she was so calm all the way till the end and she took it positively.  No offence made but i think the one dat deserves to be kicked out is Saiful. He is so not my idol. I swear i won't watch Malaysian Idol nemore if he ever get in to top 3. Blerrrr...this sucks.

i'm officially broke for this month. And when i say broke, im serious. I think i only have enough money for only a meal a day and im aredi begining to skip my dinner. Blame the mega sales and also, why so many ppl born in the month of Sept ya? And all of them are my pals so gotta get em pressies anyway. Somehow, i can sense dat this month it's gonna be tough, financial tight, assignments, stupid new hsemate and lalala. I still haven't start on my assignment yet and of course, i wanna get it done as soon as possible so i can relax later on =) Sigh, Calvin is throwing Yuke a surprise party next Thurs. I so wanna go but there's just some prob i gotta resolve..sigh, why everything gets so hard as you grow older? I want a simple life.

Talking about the new hsemate. They pissed me off. And i think they come from Alaska. They turn on the AC 24/7! Uggghh...it's not even hot in the condo and yet they just waste the electricity leaving it on all the time! Worst part is, we are the ones who's gonna get it at the end of the day. Trust me, when the bills come. It's gonna be RM400 and above. My share..for sure, at least RM100 when i even hardly use the air con. You called that fair?! They're so gonna get it.

I feel so bad. I haven't done any revision yet this holiday. Not even a single touch on my assignment. I just can't find the enthusiasm to study =P blerr..i feel guilty. Well, maybe tomoro.
i miss this two fella..they're back in hometown now. You ppl better come back soon i tell you =) most of all, i miss torturing you guys haha. I know i've said this like a thousand times but i jus can't help it. I miss home... I still think KK is the best despite theres so many malls here and stuff. But nothing beats KK man. I think i only realise this ever since i come here. As the saying goes, u'll only learn to appreciate the things u have once u lose it. RUL n JACQ, i know this might be too late to say..but GOOOD LUCK on ur exam! heehee..

yipee yay yay..im on a holiday next week. Happy for me you people?wehehehe...

*i wanna go and sit down somewhere..where they play nice jazzy songs. Somewhere cosy with dim lights where serenity feels the air..and i would be able to enjoy myself once again and get away wif all the troubles in my head. And after that i wanna walk along the beach, with my feet naked on the white white sands..and listening to the sound of the waves.* oh how nice.. i just finished my Management assignment( well..sorta) but oh well *rejoice* I was just looking through the pictures and as time passes by, i think physically i didnt change much but whenever i show my uni frens pictures of me back in high school, they hardly recognize it's me. I want nothing now except to go home. I miss my family and my crib. This is the point of my life where i feel nothing can satisfy me except going back home~ I was all happy last few days and suddenly i jus feeling down i ain't know why. Mood swing maybe hah. my beloved attic. I've bought lotsa stuff from Ikea to deco my room and now im officially broke. and u know wat? the daim cake in Ikea is so so deli-cious~~

It was sorta like a bday present. It's a lil early but oh well nvm. i think i wanna change the layout. Im getting bored of it edi...still thinking of what theme colour i wanna use for the next layout. Any su-gest-tion?
Had the most delicious dinner yday wuakakaka =) so tonite, im cookin again..soup this time ;] Droolin aredi rul? =P

yipee! Silvia found my earring this afternoon *big grin*. I was wearing it yday and suddenly i realize that its gone~! well well, thank God she found it in her room. must have slip off while i was at her crib.
Omg..look at how THIN this book is and try guessing the price. its only like a 100 pages and it cost me damn rm50. I regreted buying this thingy. I dont think its worth it at all and i guess the author is happily laughing at all the idiots who's buying his book. Blahhh...


okay...im gonna take a bath and then have my dinner.Im gonna cook tomato chicken tonite..weeeeeeeeee............ =]

Just had a great convo wif Hannah thru msn. She's now in KK enjoying her pleasant holiday and im here all alone in my condo =( all my housemates back in hometown blerr... Still, I had a very fruitful week =) Basically lotsa shopping this week. Lets do a recap shall we? Mon ~ Went Midvalley wif Silvia and Leonard. Had a superrr great time hanging out wif em two crazy peeps haha. And umm..bought lotsa stuff too =P Tues ~ Sungei Wang wif Han and W.L. Din buy anything cuz wasnt in the mood to shop but i went to Quiksilver and i saw a superr gorgeous pink Roxy top =) But uh, its over my budget so nah.. And im eyeing for the white wallet..its sexay. Wed ~ Pyramid wif umm, Hannah and Irwan. Bought couple of stuff n took some sticky pics =) Thurs~ Nothing much in particular..Went lunch wit yuke and Calvin. Havent been hangin out wit em for a while. I <3 em to bits. they're really gr8 people. Fri ~ Lunch in Pyramid wif Justin n Ivy. Was planning to go Ikea( they serve deliCiOus food =) ) but didnt go due to the lack of time. Went cell group jus now and it was fabuloso. walalala...i now have 0 credit left for my phone~~~ *sob sob* No more outgoing calls and sms..Im dying..Pfft..gotta sleep early tonite..hadda go uni tomoro morn to settle some stuff =.=' p/s...cyn darling...when are ya coming to KL? holla me when ur here k?

gagagaga...tomoro will be my first day in Uni. =) Im feelin excited aredi heh.. and i've promised myself to work really really hard this time. Ahhhhh...im so nervous..and tired rite now.

Went for sunday service today and it was great..esp the praise and worship part. WOO! United Live might throw a concert in my church but dats only a maybe. I really really wan them to come...gagaga. I wanna meet the hillsongs peeps! I am so in <3 wif Joel Houston and Marty Sampson!! They rock my life man... Pledge has aredi started and i should start saving up.. =( there's so many things that i wanted to buy but i guess..i'll sacrifice this time. For God..mwahhhhssss. =) I'll walk by faith. walalala... Dida has gone back hometown and same goes wif Alfred wahahaha..so me and Hannah is now conquering d whole house...which is so much fun cuz we can make lotssss of noise without any limits =P BUT, Hannah's goin back 2 kk next Friday leaving me alone in da house.. =( dats fine but i jus miss home..i really do *sobsss* Can't wait to go back home again. Its been 2 weeks aredi and i still can't get over the homesick dilemma... tata...im off to bed for a short nap ;P

Im still having a lil cough right now boooo.. OMG..Im so happy that it's orientation tomorrow. At last i have something to do. I've been basically rottin at home for the past few weeks and it has bored me aredi. Holidays is not always fun...especially the long ones. Wooo..im so excited about tomorrow. *wonders* hmm...how woould my new uni life's be like =)

p.s. Im lurvin my journal...ikikikiki..

Pfft...cant believe i've been here for a month aredi and im goin back to KL tomoro. I am so gonna miss home. Maybe cuz i aredi got used to staying here in my own sweet attic. I loveee my room..its big and it has everything i want. Cool. But guess i have to give it up and go back to my normal hectic uni life.
I want another long holiday~! Can't wait till summer heh. 

I'm a lazy bum..last entry of my journal was umm March? I havent been able to keep a daily journal. I think it's fun to keep a journal cuz at the end of the day i'll be able to read back what i've done and achieve so far, and dat includes the embarassing moments i've been thru =P so i'll be able to laff at myself again and act foolish. Bwahaha..im a certified sucker. I think life is about enjoying ourselves and be happy.
I was just talking to hannah y'day and suddenly she just got so serious and ask me to treasure Brandon...cuz we'll never know what will happen later on. She kinda reminded me of the precious things that i have now..fam,frens n etc. Im glad..that i have all these sweet lovely dovey ppl around muah...We should always cherish what we have and never be jealous of what we don't own. Thats the right way to live life.
*mwahhh to d lurvely peepo in my life~ i lub you guys...

Im glad. Yes, so glad that the presentation was over! Boy..i was so nervous but i guess i did okay so it's all gewd. Whats best is that my Econs test is postponed to next friday. Hurray! which means i could go shopping! =] i wanna go FCUK, Guess and Mambo in One Utama. I <3 One U better than MidValley now hehe. Probably i'll head to Ikea to get some household stuff too heh. Here comes the shopping queen. Went to steven's corner in OUG lastnite for dinner wif hannah, dree, wenni and rudy to try out the popular bird there. It was umm delicious and yes..i ate a bird. no 2 birds. How cruel. But it was delicious. After dinner we went to cruise around in Bangsar for a while before heading home. It's been a while since i went to cruise at nite wif em. Miss the crazy nightlife..goin down to kl in the middle of the nite and chill out. Being a teen is crazy but fun. Omg, there's a guy in the comp lab here who actually looks like my bro. I can't stop staring at him i dunno why. I miss him. I actually miss his nuisance. funny. Pfft..time for class...

talked with my mom just a moment ago. I really miss her so so much. Words are never enough to explain how much i need her now. I havent seen her for about 2 months and i really miss home. Someone give me a hug? I told her about me failing maths and she says its okay...never stop trying.She advised me to do more excersises. While i was talking wit my mom..Jervis came and whispered "who's dat ur talking to?" i muttered "my mom" then he said loudly "HI Auntie!". Funny guy...he made me laugh. 

Im a bit nervous bout my presentation on monday. I'm worried about how am i gonna refute on the topic human cloning. It's not as easy as i thought at first.
Yuke lose her cell phone y'day when she was in KLCC. Poor her..this is the 3rd time already. A month ago, she just lost her samsung; the one wif the built in camera.
Moral lesson : never lend your phone to a stranger no matter what.
Thats what happened to her. A taiwanese guy approached her telling her that he needed to borrow a phone to call and to convince her, he gave him his cell phone to hold a lil while for assurance. Within a minute, he ran off.

I seriously need a rest. Im so tired..It was so hard to get up this morning..too sleepy. I woke up walkin like a drunk kiddo heading towards the bathroom with a blank mind. Blah..Math test today. Screwed it up and guess im gonna fail again.Pfft.. dun feel like thinking of it anymore.

Wat hits me the most was the d girl dat i dislike so much actually beat me!pfft..she got an A. I must work harder. Im in a major depression mood...I can't think of anything except the word stress in my head and i think its killing me softly, gently...silenty. Today im supposed to hand in my english assignment and i screw it up.f*ck the comp in the computer lab...it's a pain printing my stuff there. It took me almost an hour fixing it and print it out..i did the assignment wrongly...almost 50% of it and i skipped two classes today.I feel like sucha loser. Man..theres a girl who's sitting next to me talkin on the phone so loud that really irritates me..hey, its the library...cant she just keep it dont a lil bit?somehow when something goes wrong in my life...everything will turn out to be sucha mess. pffft...im stressed out..i need a break. Im having math test this wed and i havent studied yet because i was too busy with my english assignment. Im afraid im gonna fail again. Ppl, jus pray for me mmmkay? Life is never easy..gonna strive until the end. I will never give it up.

Im here in Sandy and Yosia's house to online..i should go back by now to study up on math and accounting but i can't get my ass off the seat! lame excuse i know..hee.. I need a bath~ its so hot in here and im all sweaty..probably goin home soon after this. Man..i'm in love wif Patrick Nuo. His songs rock! And erm, he's kinda cute too. I think i'm begining to love my journal now. And maybe i'll close down my site cuz im just too busy to take care of so many things and anyway, dayzie is selling her domain away so..let's just see how things go. And so..i've got 3 hours break today so me Calvin and Yuke went to Pyramid to catch a movie. We wanted to watch the missing but it's not showing yet so we ended up watching Cabin Fever. The movie was okay but it was pretty disgusting wif blood all over..yucky.. I did the most stupid thing today....i almost trip...wif my heels! Gosh...i was so mortified...esp when i fall...there was this two guys sitting there lookin at me! bwahahaha... Nothin much to say bout today...blog laterrr

Im having headachez so i skip accounting class...i didn't feel like going anyway. Life has been..umm, bad to the truth. Problems keep arising...between me myself and friends. Its sick as hell. I really wanna breakout...get outta here at least for a moment. Everything now, makes me feel so miserable.Blah..if it dont stop...i will go maddd...
